name: Awesome CloudOps Automation
shortDescription: unSkript is an open source library of CloudOps tasks.  It provides a framework to orchestrate them into automated RunBooks (and handles all authentication for you). Automate away your DevOps toil.
longDescription: unSkript is an open source library of CloudOps tasks.  It provides a framework to orchestrate them into automated RunBooks (and handles all authentication for you). Automate away your DevOps toil.
